info.title: API Kasir Apotek
info.description: Dokumentasi API untuk sistem kasir apotek

post.summary: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token

401.description: Login gagal, email atau password salah

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: ID user yang ingin diambil datanya

403.description: Tidak dapat menghapus akun Anda sendiri

get.summary: Retrieve a single medicine by ID

parameters.name: medicineid
parameters.description: The ID of the medicine to retrieve

delete.summary: Soft delete a specific medicine by ID

parameters.name: medicineid
parameters.description: The ID of the medicine to delete

patch.summary: Update a specific medicine by ID
patch.description: Update the details of a specific medicine by its ID. You can update the medicine name, brand, price, unit, and categories.

parameters.name: medicineid
parameters.description: The ID of the medicine to update

categories.description: Array of category IDs associated with the medicine

get.summary: Retrieve a list of medicine batches
Retrieve batch details by batch ID

parameters.name: batchid
parameters.description: The ID of the batch to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieve a list of medicine categories

example.categorydescription: Medicines that kill or inhibit the growth of bacteria.

parameters.name: categoryid
parameters.description: The ID of the category to retrieve medicines for

parameters.name: categoryid
parameters.description: The ID of the category to update

requestBody.description: Data for updating the category description

parameters.name: categoryid
parameters.description: The ID of the category to delete

409.description: Cannot delete category due to foreign key constraint

message.example: Cannot delete category due to foreign key constraint

requestBody.description: Data for new medicine(s). If `stock` and `expirationdate` are provided, the system will automatically process restocking. The request body supports both a single object and an array of objects.

errors: Category with ID "CAT003" not found for medicine "Ibuprofen".

207.description: Some medicines were successfully added, while others failed.

errors: Category with ID "CAT003" not found for medicine "Ibuprofen".

400.description: All medicines failed to be added due to validation or other errors.

errors: Failed to process medicine "Ibuprofen". Error: Validation error.

requestBody.description: Data for restocking medicine(s). The request body supports both a single object and an array of objects.

failedRestocks.reason: Medicine ID not found in the database.

patch.summary: Reset stock of a specific medicine

parameters.name: medicineid
parameters.description: The ID of the medicine to reset stock

404.description: No batches found for the given medicine ID

message.example: No batches found for the given medicine ID

patch.summary: Reset stock of a specific batch of a medicine

parameters.name: batchid
parameters.description: The ID of the batch to reset stock

parameters.name: medicineid
parameters.description: The ID of the medicine to reset stock

404.description: Batch not found for the given medicine ID

message.example: Batch not found for the given medicine ID

requestBody.description: Data for new category(ies). The request body supports both a single object and an array of objects.

value.categorydescription: Medicines that kill or inhibit the growth of bacteria.

207.description: Some categories were successfully added, while others failed.

400.description: All categories failed to be added due to validation or other errors.
